SELECT * FROM question
AND question._id= #{queryForm.questionId}
AND (INSTR(question.question,#{queryForm.keyword}) OR INSTR(question.answer1,#{queryForm.keyword}) OR INSTR(question.answer2,#{queryForm.keyword}) OR INSTR(question.answer3,#{queryForm.keyword}) OR INSTR(question.answer4,#{queryForm.keyword}) )
order by question._id asc
